summary: An email from the Chief of the Criminal Division at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding an extension for monthly updates due on January 1, 2021, to January 8, 2021, to allow staff to enjoy the new year.

persons.name: Chief, Criminal Division
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is using the power of their office to extend the deadline for monthly updates from January 1 to January 8, 2021.

events.title: Original Monthly Update Deadline
events.description: Monthly updates were originally due on this date, which was the first Friday of the month.

events.title: Extended Monthly Update Deadline
events.description: The Chief of the Criminal Division extended the deadline for monthly updates to this date.

keyFacts: The Chief of the Criminal Division at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York sent an email on January 7, 2021.
The email extends the deadline for monthly updates from January 1, 2021, to January 8, 2021.
The extension was granted to allow staff to enjoy a happy new year.
